content.body: I'm not in Europe yet this week (I'll be back for the next meeting) — how do you all feel about meeting later this time, between 16:00 PT and 19:00 PT?

> <@lucacasonato:matrix.org> Feedback from TC39 in Tokyo: we should alternate this meeting between time zones to accommodate delegates from APAC better 

We could then also consider making it permanent as part of a weekly rotation if we are doing something for this
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @lucacasonato:matrix.org
Feedback from TC39 in Tokyo: we should alternate this meeting between time zones to accommodate delegates from APAC better 
We could then also consider making it permanent as part of a weekly rotation if we are doing something for this

content.body: My preference would be 17-18 or 18-19 PT, unless we have folks from the US east cost
(hours written under the assumption that Tuesday 16:00 PT is Tuesday 23:00 UTC)
